name: search_claims
description: Search claims in the knowledge graph. Supports semantic search, temporal filtering, source filtering, entity filtering, and classification filtering. All parameters are optional â€” combine as needed for precise queries.

query.description: Semantic search query. Omit to rely on other filters alone.

entity_id.description: Filter to claims that reference this entity (UUID).

source_entity_id.description: Filter to claims published by this source entity (UUID).

published_after.description: Only claims published after this date (RFC3339, e.g., '2025-01-01T00:00:00Z').

published_before.description: Only claims published before this date (RFC3339).

attribution_depth.description: Filter by attribution depth. 'primary' = direct source. 'secondhand' = named intermediary. 'indirect' = anonymous/thirdhand.

information_type.description: Filter by information type. 'assertion' = factual claims. 'analysis' = judgments/predictions. 'discourse' = public discussion. 'testimony' = personal accounts.
